actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to establish a Civil Disaster Office in the Corps of Engineers, Department of the Army, to coordinate Federal disaster relief activities.

summary.text: Establishes a Civil Disaster Office in the Corps of Engineers, Department of the Army. Directs such office to: (1) establish national natural disaster contingency plans to be implemented upon occurrance of a natural disaster; and (2) map flood-prone and disaster-prone areas and submit proposals for revised land use in such areas. Transfers specified authorities from the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to the Office

titles.title: A bill to establish a Civil Disaster Office in the Corps of Engineers, Department of the Army, to coordinate Federal disaster relief activities.
